A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Johnson pissed all over the legacy of star wars\, this was so bad i wanted to walk out several times. I have no interest in episode 9 now. How do you take a character like luke and completely destroy who he was. Leai in space was the worst moment in the movie. Disney has killed any hopes of salvaging star wars\, should ha e left it to Lucas. Star wars is not a comedy either\, too much stupid slapstick in all the wrong moments. Man i have never hated a sw film like this and have no desire for repeat viewings.
